Class Runes

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.Runes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Resettable
public class Runes extends Item implements Resettable
A class representing money currency used in the Elden Ring game. Created by:
Version:
1.0.0
Author:

    • reset

      public void reset()
      A method that reset the Runes when the game is reset. If the player is not resting (reset is caused by player death) and there are dropped runes on the ground the droppedRunes will be removed from their current location in the game map. Then the dropping runes will be register as droppedRunes.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
      See Also:
      • RunesManager.getInstance()
      • RunesManager.getDroppedRunes()
      • RunesManager.getPlayerRunes()
      • RunesManager.getDroppingRunes()
      • RunesManager.removeDroppedRunes()
      • RunesManager.removeDroppedRunes()
      • Location.removeItem(Item)
      • RunesManager.registerDroppedRunes(Runes)
      • Status.RESTING

    • pickedUp

      public void pickedUp()
      This method sets the player's runes hasDropped instance variable to false when the player picks up the runes.

      public void dropped()
